Asia: Osaka, Kochi, Jeju & Nagoya | Norwegian Cruise Lines | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Asia: Osaka, Kochi, Jeju & Nagoya 9 Days | Tokyo to Seoul Includes Free at Sea™ benefits plus US$100 onboard Credit Per Stateroom Deal Details Travel Dates 23 Mar 2027 Sale Ends Nov 30, 2025 Priced From $5,069 per person Enquire Now Includes Free at Sea™ benefits plus US$100 onboard Credit Per Stateroom Description Set sail aboard Norwegian Jade® on an unforgettable journey through Japan and South Korea — a voyage where ancient traditions, modern marvels, and natural wonders meet. Departing from Tokyo/Yokohama, explore Japan’s rich cultural tapestry with stops in Shimizu, home to stunning views of Mount Fuji, and Nagoya, a city of castles and craftsmanship. Dive into the vibrant energy of Osaka and soak in the historic elegance of nearby Kyoto, then stroll the serene temples of Kochi and reflect at the Peace Memorial in Hiroshima. Continue south to Kagoshima, framed by the active Sakurajima volcano, and discover the European-influenced charm of Nagasaki. From there, cross into South Korea with a relaxing stop on Jeju Island, before ending your journey in the dynamic capital of Seoul/Incheon, where ancient palaces and cutting-edge culture coexist. Pricing Oceanview Stateroom from $5,069* per person, twin share What's Included 9-night cruise with Norwegian Cruise Line® on board Norwegian Jade® Main meals & entertainment onboard your cruise Government & Port taxes included Includes Free at Sea™ benefits Unlimited Premium Beverages Specialty Dining Package Shore Excursion Credits Wi-Fi Package Itinerary Day 1 Tokyo (Yokohama), Japan Day 2 Mount Fuji (Shimizu), Japan Day 3 Nagoya, Japan Day 4 Kyoto (Osaka), Japan Day 5 Kochi, Japan Day 6 Hiroshima, Japan Day 7 Kagoshima, Japan Day 8 Nagasaki, Japan Day 9 Jeju, South Korea Day 10 Seoul (Icheon) South Korea Your Ship Set sail aboard Norwegian Jade® and experience a more intimate, laid-back style of cruising, where every detail is designed for comfort, fun, and freedom. Refurbished with modern décor and thoughtful touches, Norwegian Jade offers a warm, welcoming atmosphere from the moment you step on board. Indulge in over 16 diverse dining options, from the sizzling flavors of Moderno Churrascaria to elegant French fare at Le Bistro and hearty Italian favorites at La Cucina. Whether you're craving casual bites or fine dining, every meal is an experience. Onboard entertainment and activities offer something for everyone. Kids can enjoy age-specific youth programs, splash in the pool, or hang out in the Video Arcade, while adults unwind in the Mandara Spa & Salon, relax in the Spa Thermal Suite, or try their luck in the casino. From live nightly shows and open-air jogging tracks to cozy hot tubs and vibrant lounges, Norwegian Jade makes every moment at sea unforgettable. Terms & Conditions Pricing is correct as of 05 November 2025. Airfares & transfers are additional. Savings have already been applied to advertised pricing and exclude taxes and port charges. Onboard credit is per stateroom. Onboard spend is applied to the 1st and 2nd guest in the stateroom. An NZD300 per person deposit is due within 48 hours of booking confirmation. Beverage package: Eligible guests must be 21 years at time of sailing to purchase alcoholic beverages. Guests are entitled to two beverages per person per transaction. Excludes: Excludes all drinks in the Connoisseur's Collection, Wine and Spirit Experiences, tastings or Flights, Starbucks, Ice Bars, room service, package sales, bottled water, ship specific promotions or beer buckets, designated super premium brands (subject to change), bottled wine, mini bar purchases, fresh squeezed juices, wine dispenser, energy drinks or vending machines. Further conditions apply. Wi-Fi package: Internet access of 150 minutes of high-speed Wi-Fi powered by Starlink. Provides 1 login per guest that can be used on 1 device at a time. Applicable to all guests in the stateroom. Shore Excursion Credit: Includes a USD$50 credit applicable to first guest on the cruise reservation. The first guest will receive US$50 shore excursion credit toward every shore excursion booked, per port including debarkation tours. Credit has no monetary value and is nonrefundable. Specialty Dining package: Applies to guests 1-2 on the reservation. Includes 1-4 meals at selected specialty dining restaurants on board depending on duration of cruise. Reservation is suggested prior to sailing. Some cruise staterooms are based on a 'guarantee' stateroom. The exact stateroom grade, number and location on the ship will be allocated at the discretion of the cruise line. Some staterooms have obstructed views. Subject to availability & change. Further terms and conditions apply. Experience the world differently.
